name: kiosk-Rennes2_University
short_description:
Now update ! Kiosk is an ubuntu 12.04.

An answer for a Kiosk application from Université Rennes 2.

A browser-only OS for web kiosks and web workstations.
This is a "Home Brew" of a kiosk application, produced in Université Rennes 2, Rennes, France.
Our 21.000+ students and staff need to consult our main library catalog.
Based on and customized from an Ubuntu distribution, with an auto-logon bootup , this kiosk application will lock the user with the embeded Firefox browser, on a dedicated portal, with no other possibilities.

This Iso file is working fine on most 386 architecture. It has been tested on multiple Dell PCs, Asus EEEbox and even customized Wyse V10LE thin client ( with internal USB sticks ..)
Thank you.

Video here : 
- http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GQlXWDULw7c
- http://youtu.be/OUvSYmNcQRs
summary: A browser-only OS for web kiosks & web workstations.
